examples: Put your name here.
The teacher called out our names one by one for attendance.
The machine takes its name from its inventor.
The name rings a bell.
Your name is mud, sonny!
words.defineEn: the word someone or something is called or known by
words.defineVi: từ ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó được gọi hoặc biết bởi

examples: We had to write our last names on the exam paper.
In many cultures, the last name is passed down from the father's side of the family.
They asked for his last name at the hotel check-in, to confirm his reservation.
We should spell our last names when making reservations to avoid any misunderstandings.
My friend's last name is difficult to pronounce, so she often uses a nickname instead.
words.defineEn: the name we share with our family, parents, or siblings
words.defineVi: tên chúng tôi chia sẻ với gia đình, cha mẹ hoặc anh chị em của chúng tôi

examples: Every age has its book, after all.
Boys his age are a law unto themselves.
Reckless youth makes rueful age.
His parents have not yet reached retirement age.
My parents came of age during the 1960s.
words.defineEn: the number of years something has existed or someone has been alive
words.defineVi: số năm một cái gì đó đã tồn tại hoặc một ai đó đã được sống

examples: He memorized his girlfriend's address by heart.
The police officer took my name and address.
Give me your name and address.
The address is written in capital letters to ensure clarity.
I sent a letter to their address but haven't received a response yet.
words.defineEn: the information that helps us find a place so we can go there or send a letter or package to that place
words.defineVi: thông tin giúp chúng tôi tìm một địa điểm để chúng tôi có thể đến đó hoặc gửi thư hoặc gói hàng đến địa điểm đó

examples: My friend's birthday is on a Friday this year.
Finally the couple may be celebrating a birthday, a wedding anniversary or some other red-letter day.
It's your friends birthday.
I bought a toy for my nephew's birthday.
He hid my son's new bicycle until his birthday
words.defineEn: the day and month of your birth in every year
words.defineVi: ngày và tháng sinh của bạn trong mỗi năm

examples: The birthdate is an important piece of information for medical professionals.
His birthdate is on May 10th, which makes him a Taurus according to astrology.
My friend likes to share her birthdate on social media.
They needed to know his birthdate to create his account.
His birthdate falls on a holiday this year, making it extra special and memorable.
words.defineEn: the numbers that show on which day, month, or year someone was born
words.defineVi: những con số hiển thị vào ngày, tháng hoặc năm ai đó được sinh ra

examples: I was enjoying every single cut of marinated chicken, beef, and pork.
The ticket for the bus is valid for a single journey.
My siblings and I share a single bedroom in our house.
Some of the people don't deserve a single red cent.
Not a single jot or tittle goes past the eye of the boss without her noticing.
words.defineEn: not in a relationship or marriage
words.defineVi: không phải trong một mối quan hệ hoặc hôn nhân

examples: My parents are married and have been together for a long time.
They have built a life together as a married couple, sharing responsibilities and dreams.
I can't believe John is in bed with his married coworker!
After years of dating, they finally decided to tie the knot and start their journey as a married couple.
Like most married couples we've had our ups and downs, but life's like that.
Keep your passport in a safe place.
She keeps her passport in a secure place at home.
The immigration officer reviewed my passport before granting entry.
They never travel without their passports.
We had to show our passports and boarding passes at the airport immigration checkpoint.
words.defineEn: an official document issued by a government that identifies someone as a citizen of a particular country, which is needed when leaving a country and entering another one
words.defineVi: một tài liệu chính thức do chính phủ ban hành xác định ai đó là công dân của một quốc gia cụ thể, cần thiết khi rời khỏi một quốc gia và nhập cảnh vào một quốc gia khác

examples: The phone number for customer service is printed on the back of the product.
She received a missed call from an unknown phone number.
I called the wrong phone number and apologized for the mistake.
He asked me for my phone number and I drew a blank - I just couldn't remember it.
He memorized her phone number so he could reach her anytime.
words.defineEn: the number used for calling someone's phone
words.defineVi: số được sử dụng để gọi điện thoại của một ai đó

examples: The question requires critical thinking and analysis.
The quiz consisted of multiple-choice questions.
The book raises many important questions.
The waiter patiently answered our questions about the ingredients in the dish.
Can I ask a question?
words.defineEn: a sentence, phrase, or word, used to ask for information or to test someone’s knowledge
words.defineVi: một câu, cụm từ hoặc từ, được sử dụng để hỏi thông tin hoặc để kiểm tra kiến thức của ai đó

examples: These heroes courageously answered the call of duty.
The waiter patiently answered our questions about the ingredients in the dish.
Her answer is no.
No one knows the answer.
She guessed the answer straight away.
words.defineEn: something we say, write, or do when we are replying to a question
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó chúng tôi nói, viết, hoặc làm khi chúng tôi đang trả lời một câu hỏi
